sentences.english: Christopher Marlowe is one of the outstanding representatives of English Renaissance dramatists.

sentences.english: His realism theory is an essential component of his entire outlook of literature and art.

sentences.english: That Later Renaissance is a complicated historical term. W. J.

sentences.english: At first the artists of the Renaissance only had single-point perspective.
